rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a living area that includes an integrated eco-friendly design, natural ventilation and ample daylight. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the main door to the east.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious open kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials. The dining area is adjacent, ensuring fluidity between cooking and social spaces, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Luxury Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Penthouse studio apartment bedroom with large garden views, West-facing orientation with a spacious balcony to ensure natural cooling. The design promotes eco-friendliness through high insulation and green building materials.

rooms.name: Bathroom & Utility Room
rooms.description: Modern bathroom complemented by utility space, designed with water-saving fixtures and energy-efficient lighting; arranged per Vastu norms for optimal functionality.

rooms.name: Eco-friendly Living Space Extension
rooms.description: Additional living area integrated with indoor-outdoor connectivity. Features a glass wall to merge the interior with an extensive garden, enhancing eco-living and natural aesthetics.

openings.description: Double-glazed entrance door with energy-efficient design, promoting secure entry and optimal light flow.
